scene_target: Artie defeats his first enemy and discovers the destructive scale of his crits.
goal: Survive the slime encounter and trigger a massive critical hit.
conflict: Artie's 1 Dexterity makes him miss repeatedly while the slime's touch is lethal.
required_callbacks: The Patch-Note Oaks screaming error messages
constraints: Artie must miss the slime exactly 5 times before landing the final hit
The final hit must trigger a [System Notification: Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit]
The crit must destroy both the slime and a Patch-Note Oak tree in the background
Artie must reach Level 2 by the end of the scene
end_condition: Artie gains a level and views his new, inconsistent stat sheet.

invariants_add: location: The Whispering Woods (Status: Near smoking crater)
persona_updates: Artie is beginning to realize the destructive potential of his 'broken' build.

chapter_so_far_add: Artie survived his first combat encounter by accidentally nuking the tutorial zone.
Artie discovered that his crits can overwrite System rules and destroy world objects.
key_events: Artie missed the Level 1 Slime 5 times due to his 1 Dexterity stat.
The slime charged a Heavy Attack that threatened to dissolve Artie.
Artie landed a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit on the slime's core, deleting the creature.
The resulting blast destroyed a Patch-Note Oak and carved a fifty-foot furrow into the earth.
Artie's Luck increased to 104 and he received a +1 Dexterity 'Pity Bonus'.
The Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit ability entered a 24-hour cooldown.
last_scene: Artie engaged a Level 1 Slime in the Whispering Woods, missing five times due to his low Dexterity.
He triggered a Super-Mega-Ultra-Crit that vaporized the slime and a nearby Patch-Note Oak.
The encounter concluded with Artie leveling up to Level 2 and gaining a pity bonus to his Dexterity.

The prose includes specific UI stat values (Dexterity: 1, Luck: 104, HP: 1/1), but the character state object for CHAR_ARTIE contains an empty 'stats' map. UI numbers must be sourced from the state.

The invariant 'Artie is currently in physical contact with a Level 1 Slime' is violated at the start of the scene (where he is three inches away) and at the end (where the slime is deleted).
The scene prose depicts the exact sequence of events already summarized in the 'last_scene' and 'chapter_so_far' blocks, indicating a repetition of previously established narrative.
